text: does it cause any problems if you use "type" as column name in a hubDB table?

seems so ... I had this case in one table and I couldn't get the data of this column with the hubdb_table_rows() function. Renaming the "type" column didn't resolve the problem but cloning the table after renaming the col and then using the cloned table was a solution for me.
ooh that would be much better than a loop
